alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crook County through 530 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Devils Tower Junction, or 16 miles west of Sundance. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlile, Devils Tower Junction and Devils Tower National Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
